column1: Little Goat Diner////So if you want to be super cool and hipstery
column2: hit this place up in your skinny jeans on a Friday night and be prepared to wait 2 hours for a table.  But if you don't care about other people actually seeing how cool you are by going to this restaurant
column3: seriously go at an off time and have one of the best meals of your LIFE without a significant wait.  Mark my words -- you WILL be back.  And I will be jealous.  Guaranteed. ;]
